groups.name: Alpha users
groups.description: Alpha release channel users. Bleeding ege, most unstable features

groups.name: Beta users
groups.description: Beta release channel users. Features that have made it through alpha but not quite ready for primetime

groups.name: Power users
groups.description: Advanced users that receive complex features we keep hidden from normies. Also serves as an initial production release group.
